DOC.brief_summary: The First Twenty® ( TF20 ) recently develop not-for-profit , web-mobile program firefighter ( FFs ) specifically focus improve fitness nutrition knowledge practice . The program design FFs background tactical fitness , marketing program development professional , nutrition exercise scientist . Preliminary data suggest program well-received FFs result significant improvement body composition physical fitness . One innovative approach eventual dissemination TF20 VFFs fitness-for duty medical exam . The synergy create link TF20 intervention component , feedback VFFs medical exam , health message physician predict maximize impact much-needed intervention . The goal propose project tailor TF20 use clinic base setting ( CB-TF20 ) VFFs pilot test comparison American Heart Association 's Life 's Simple 7 ( LS7 ) , web-based diet physical activity knowledge/behavior lifestyle program . The specific aim : 1 ) Conduct formative research key stakeholder VFF community ( e.g. , physician , department leadership , VFFs ) determine best practice implement clinic-based , web-mobile health wellness program VFFs medical provider ; 2 ) Develop clinic-based version TF20 ( CB-TF20 ) beta-test VFFs ; , 3 ) Conduct 6 month , 2-arm , pilot cluster ( i.e. , department ) randomize clinical trial ( PCRCT ) determine comparative effectiveness revise CB-TF20 LS7 body composition , Framingham Risk Scores , diet/physical activity knowledge behavior among VFF BMI > 25.0kg/m2 ; conduct evaluation CB-TF20 material technology . This innovative R34 study critical step provide much need intervention VFFs provide annual examination .
